Articles.Content:
Yup pi

The user below me has been to eve (i haven't . )

I did, but it was a one way only trip, and it was a rover.

The user below me will see that I spend too much time on this sub-forum and will think I should get a live.

yep, i've seen you a lot here.

The user below me has played the original Ratchet and clank on the PS2 and/or has heard of/plays universe sandbox 1 or 2.

Yes! Long live the almighty Ratchet's wrench! As for universe sandbox, I haven't played it but heard about it.

The user below me finds xkcd funny.

Whats xkcd

the user below has never seen me before

False, I have.

(by the way xkcd is this webcomic: http://www.xkcd.com/)

The user below me has posted a KSP craft file on the forums.

True.

The user below me completed the Duna-2 challenge (land on Duna & its moon in one big mission!!!).

havnt heard of it.

the user below me knows someone else who plays ksp

Yes, yes I do.... *checks for video camera*

The person below me is currently procrastinating from something.?

No. I've done the checklist for today and going to sleep.

The user below me has had his craft atracked by the Kraken.

Yes I have it was my ISS replica

The user below me is a kerbal

Nope.

The user below me loves Laythe

Yep, just having been there

The user below me has been to Eeloo

nope, barely been outside kerbins soi before except for a few asteroids.

the user below me overbuilds 99% of their rockets.

probably.....

the user below me has seen green iron crown

Negative.

The user below me can write code (html counts too)

no.

the use below me could fly with a wingsuit if someone randomly strapped them into one and threw them of a cliff.

I guess I would fly for a little while at least.

The user below me always sits by the window when flying.

No.

The user below me likes cheese.

NO

The person below me has seen a dev post in a thread not started by themselves or another dev..

Yes.

The user below me has fewer than 10 posts. Come out, lurker!

01:49:22 <pCactus> ;kmath Do I have less than 10 posts?

01:49:22 <kmath> Ask again later

The person below me has not been to the #KSPOfficial IRC channel (yet).

Edited January 17, 2015 by flashcactus
ninja

Negative.

The user below me has played KSP.

I'm not sure who hasn't. (on this forum)

<pCactus> What can you say about the user below me, Kountdown?

<Kountdown> i think he's just mad

I'm not mad!

The user below me goes on the Steam KSP Forum chat.
